column1: Vepagunta is a suburb in Visakhapatnam city. It comes under Pendurthi revenue division. It has a post office

column3: 881. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%.  Vepagunta has an average literacy rate of 73%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 80%
column5: and female literacy is 67%. In Vepagunta
column6: 10% of the population is under 6 years of age.
